name: Lemon and Cilantro Shrimp
author: EQGIRL
summary: This is a delicious shrimp dish and very easy to prepare. It can be served alone, on top of a baby green salad, or over pasta.
ingredients: ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil
directions: In a bowl, toss shrimp with lemon zest and cilantro to coat
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat
Sprinkle oil with salt, then stir in the shrimp, lemon zest, and cilantro
Cook, stirring, 5 minutes, or until shrimp are opaque
Transfer to a serving bowl, drizzle with remaining oil, lemon zest, and olive oil from the skillet
Squeeze lemon juice over shrimp, season with pepper, and serve immediately
